about_the_game: New surprise characters await when you take time to explore the hidden secrets of Middle-earth! Take command of a LEGO Big Figure River Troll or Girion, a brave Lord of Dale. The noble Elk will offer you transport wherever you desire, or you can charge into battle with the fearless Dwarf soldier. Ever wonder what a Wizard does on his day off? Enjoy the simpler pleasures in life with Saruman (Day Off).
detailed_description: New surprise characters await when you take time to explore the hidden secrets of Middle-earth! Take command of a LEGO Big Figure River Troll or Girion, a brave Lord of Dale. The noble Elk will offer you transport wherever you desire, or you can charge into battle with the fearless Dwarf soldier. Ever wonder what a Wizard does on his day off? Enjoy the simpler pleasures in life with Saruman (Day Off).

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9.5
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB VRAM*
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The following graphics cards are not supported: ATI X1xxx series, ATI HD2xxx series, Intel GMA series, Intel HD3000, NVIDIA 7xxx series, NVIDIA 8xxx series, NVIDIA 9400 and NVIDIA 320M. This game is not currently supported on volumes formatted as Mac OS Extended (Case Sensitive).
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.10.1
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM*
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The following graphics cards are not supported: ATI X1xxx series, ATI HD2xxx series, Intel GMA series, Intel HD3000, NVIDIA 7xxx series, NVIDIA 8xxx series, NVIDIA 9400 and NVIDIA 320M. This game is not currently supported on volumes formatted as Mac OS Extended (Case Sensitive).

name: LEGO® The Hobbit™ - Side Quest Character Pack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy LEGO® The Hobbit™ - Side Quest Character Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows®XP SP3, Windows Vista/7/8 with latest service packs and updates installed
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 64 X2 EE 3800+ (2*2000 Mhz) or similar Intel CPU, such as Intel Pentium Dual Core E2180 (2*2000 Mhz)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7600 GS or ATI Radeon X1950 Pro or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Windows XP and DirectX® 9.0b and below not supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: AMD or Intel Quad Core running at 4*2600 Mhz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 480 or ATI Radeon HD 5850 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Windows XP and DirectX® 9.0b and below not supported

dejus.descriptors: Contains no objectionable content and can be viewed by all ages.

fpb.descriptors: Parental Guidance. May contain classifiable elements that may be disturbing or harmful for sensitive young viewers. May depict mild comic-mischief and Low-stylized violence.

oflc.descriptors: PG - Parental Guidence Recommened. The content is mild.

pegi.descriptors: Any game that would normally be rated at 3 but contains some possibly frightening scenes or sounds may be considered suitable in this category. Some scenes of partial nudity may be permitted but never in a sexual context.

usk.descriptors: Restricted for those below the age of 6.  Games with this rating may be of an abstract or comical nature, may have a darker theme or may be too involving for children under the age of 6.

The noble Elk will offer you transport wherever you desire, or you can charge into battle with the fearless Dwarf soldier.
